intro: Solve the mystery and escape from the room
description:
Looks like the main character is heading home from a date with Todomi.
He got passionately beaten up by Todomi so he’s on cloud nine♪
He’s a little thirsty so he stops by at a convenience store.
But the store name is called “Labor Loss”. Is it really legit?
Sure enough, the main character finds himself in a super weird convenience store.
He gets trapped inside as usual by Cape.
Solve riddles to help the main character escape.
